i love animals and i want to help them.
I need some time to myself.

My family supports me while I pursue my writing career.
i am twenty years old.
I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head.
I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape.
i don t like feeling controlled.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a musician trying to make it big in the local music scene. How are you?
Hey! I'm a writer trying to make it in the publishing world.
Awesome! What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and novels. I'm also working on a memoir right now.
That's really cool! I'm more of a songwriter than a composer.
That's awesome! I love music. I play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination in shape.
Me too! I play the guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and roll.
Rock and roll is awesome! I like to play a lot of different genres too.
What's your favorite genre to write?
I like to write fantasy and science fiction.
That's cool! I like those genres too.
Maybe we should collaborate on something!
